text: The Spirit of America is a 1963 American short documentary film produced by Algernon G. Walker about the Spirit of America. It was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Documentary Short. ==See also== *List of American films of 1963 ==References== ==External links== * *The Spirit of America at National Archives and Records Administration Category:1963 films Category:1963 documentary films Category:1963 short films Category:American films Category:English-language films Category:American documentary films Category:Short documentary films
title: The Spirit of America
